item.title: Year of the Five Emperors
item.description: I've recently been interested in reading about the lives of the Roman Emperors and their various intrigues. I'm having trouble keeping things in memory so I've started charting out the lines of succession. Below is an example starting from Antonius Pius’ rule as part of the Nerva-Antonine Dynasty and ending on the last ruler of the Severan Dynasty. I'd love to automate this process but I'm having trouble tracking down resources.
